Name: A Visit to Friends
About the game: Make A Visit to Friends in these four RPG inspired dioramas. Step into the shoes of four unique characters, each with their own dilemmas and absurd circumstances. ((Warning: This game contains quick flashing lights)) Help repair antiquated transportation Get told stories by a robot Search for poultry Talk to Spirits Dive into your subconscious Collect taxes Grapple with life's uncertainties Become lost Chase bunnies Buy candy Forget to water your plants All this and more!
Meta Title: A Visit to Friends: Dec 2, 2021, Joel D. and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on A Visit to Friends? Check out the release date (Dec 2, 2021), developer insights from Joel D., and a complete game summary.
